featured.text: Jack says you'll not only find it handy in your studies, but a great argument-saver when playing Scrabble with your friends.

definition.zh_def: 一種字母拼字遊戲，玩家使用字母磚拼出單詞以獲得分數。
definition.en_def: A word game in which players use letter tiles to create words on a game board for points.
definition.example: We played Scrabble last night and I scored the highest points.
